Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review the goals for the week.
Set up playtesting environment and prepare build for testing.
Conduct initial playtesting session with selected team members.
Gather and record feedback from the playtest regarding bugs and gameplay discrepancies.
Schedule a meeting with @qtest-1 to discuss initial findings from playtesting.
Work with @qtest-1 to document identified issues and start prioritizing them.
Review existing gameplay mechanics and prepare a list of potential changes based on playtesting feedback.
Send a summary email to @lpro-1 and @ldes-1 regarding playtesting results and proposed changes.
